ComicInfo.Title: Slaughter on 10th Avenue!
ComicInfo.Summary: Slaughter on 10th Avenue!: Spider-Man breaks into S.H.I.E.L.D. to rescue Black Widow. Viper sends Boomerang and Silver Samurai to kill them both.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:41:35. [Issue ID 33530]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority

ComicInfo.Penciller: Rich Buckler,Sal Buscema,Steve Leialoha,Sal Buscema,Steve Leialoha
